comments.body: It depends on what kind of college life you want. Don't leave it up to a single poll to decide where you would go.

I don't mind an academic focus college , I don't care about fests either 
but I do want some time for myself to learn some other things that's all
Does pes give you free time?

Thanks Mr cuminabag :(
Yeah the same question, does pes give free time, or the competition is too overwhelming?
From what I have heard from other seniors you have a lot of projects to do during your "free time" but these are relevant and something that highly improve your value to a company
Free time isn't related to competition though. Competition is high here. As for free time, not too much. Throughout the semester you are occupied with work.
What i meant to say is , if there is a lot of competition then the cgpa that can be called as good cgpa  increases , so you would need to invest more time to secure that cgpa
